title: Changes in Solid Waste Disposal Since 1960

content.question: Based on the data in the graph, which of the following likely occurred from 1960 to 2015 because of changes in solid waste disposal methods?

choices.label: Fewer natural resources needed to be extracted.
Less carbon dioxide was released into the atmosphere.
Less land was used for landfills.

content.answer: Fewer natural resources needed to be extracted.

skill.text: Skill 7.D: Use data and evidence to support a potential solution.
